name: @azure/core-xml
description: Core library for interacting with XML payloads

scripts.audit: node ../../../common/scripts/rush-audit.js && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --package-lock-only 2>&1 && npm audit
scripts.build:browser: npm run build:ts && cross-env ONLY_BROWSER=true rollup -c 2>&1
scripts.build:node: npm run build:ts && cross-env ONLY_NODE=true rollup -c 2>&1
scripts.build:test: npm run build:ts && npm run bundle:test
scripts.build:test:browser: npm run build:ts && npm run bundle:test:browser
scripts.build:test:node: npm run build:ts && npm run bundle:test:node
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && rollup -c 2>&1 && api-extractor run --local && npm run build:types
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint:fix: eslint package.json tsconfig.json api-extractor.json src test --ext .ts --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.lint: eslint package.json tsconfig.json api-extractor.json src test --ext .ts -f html -o coreXml-lintReport.html || exit 0
scripts.test:browser: npm run build:test:browser && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run build:test:node && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run bundle:test:node && npm run unit-test:node && npm run bundle:test:browser && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser

author: Microsoft Corporation
